label: A2BC2D7_oC48_63_g_c_g_c2eg-001
title: LaCa$_{2}$Mn$_{2}$O$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
This is a Ruddlesden-Popper structure. 
 We use the data taken at 12K. 
 The site we label La I (4c) is 66\% lanthanum and 34\% calcium, while the Ca I (8g) site is 83\% calcium and 17\% lanthanum. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A7B2C3_oC48_63_c2eg_g_cg-001}{Sr$_{3}$SnO$_{7}$ is a ternary form of this structure.
